This'll be my last post till Friday. Everyone please leave my chars 
alone till then.

Thanx for helping me speed through this, Rdahl.

::Element::

"Slag!" Element growls, diving down to catch Firearm. He looks over 
to Motormaster.

"We'll meet again, and you won't come out of that meeting so easily."

With that, Element turns around, flying back to the Element (ship, 
not gestalt). The shields flicker off and he enters, splitting into 
five bots and carrying Firearm to the CF chambers.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Ive got no more time to waist with you Maximal idiot" Motormaster 
spat, he
> noticed Speedbreaker's grip wavering, he put his gun down, and flung
> Firearm to the side, quite viciously. Firearm was sent hurteling 
quite far,
> about 50 feet away from there position, and without anyone to hold 
him up,
> he started to plumet, starting at the 650 foot height, "Save him, 
or slag
> us Maximal" he then patted Astroblast, getting him ready to fly.
